text: @AngharadStone @_megtonner @EnvAgency @perry_jims Also maps - really need visuals and stats to show what the challenge is over the next few years and decades.
@AngharadStone @EnvAgencySW I have that covered thanks Angharad. It's the national view I'm looking for.
RT @Michael4Sussex: It seems Southern Water has insufficiently invested in its infrastructure and that's had devastating effects in #Bewbus‚Ä¶
@PippaGoldfinger For the second part of your request, we'll need to find someone from @EnvAgencySW who covers the Bristol patch
@PippaGoldfinger @EnvAgency @ACJSissons The first bit sounds very much like the talk you gave at Bristol Uni - do you know who would be best placed to do something similar?

@FyldeSandDunes @Lancswildlife @fyldecouncil @BpoolCouncil @EnvAgency @FyldeRangers @FyldeBeachCare @DiscoverFylde @LythamCG @StAnnesTweetUp @LivingSeasNW Excellent work Fylde! Nice storage of new sand which (additional to other benefits) will help coping with storm action. A great reminder that sometimes relatively inexpensive and simple approaches to coastal management can lead to great results.
@floodinnovation @EnvAgency @perry_jims @UniOfHull Can you follow me so that I can message you?
RT @TheENDSReport: The @EnvAgency has denied conflict of interest rules may have been breached after it emerged one of its senior employees‚Ä¶

@AngharadStone @_megtonner @EnvAgency @perry_jims Hi Angharad, someone who can talk about flood risk at a national level with stats to show what we're up against. We'll have other speakers talking about approaches elsewhere in the world (particularly the Netherlands) and looking at local (Bristol) challenges.

Site visit today undertaking a rapid soil compaction walkover for @SCRiversTrust.@EnvAgencyNW 5 fields done 17 to go! Not the optimal time year to do this. Nonetheless a really useful way of assessing potential feasibility of areation for #nfm infiltration. #soilhealth #soil https://t.co/Zi73UkbI4b

The @EnvAgency has denied conflict of interest rules may have been breached after it emerged one of its senior employees was leaving to join a water company that is under criminal investigation by the watchdog.
https://t.co/nA77g7qxUS
@MBen_15 @enviroDNA @SESatHull @BerndHaenfling @EnvAgency Great job
RT @GreenGreenwich: @ana_captures @beckettrankine @CharltonCSE7 @XRGreenwich @SilvertownTn @pedalmeapp @livingstreets @TransportActio2 @Roy‚Ä¶

The @EnvAgency has confirmed its officers could be authorised to break the law during undercover operations after attempts to limit a new law currently going through parliament were quashed. #SpyCopsBill 
https://t.co/23f3QAmgyD

@EnvAgency plans to overhaul its river quality monitoring regime by introducing a new system that monitors water quality at randomly selected sites have been branded a ‚Äúload of rubbish‚Äù by its staff 

https://t.co/s5poEg9JZR
